diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts of Contemporary History.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    CH[Contemporary History] --> WWI[World War I]
    CH --> WWII[World War II]
    CH --> CW[Cold War]
    CH --> PCW[Post-Cold War Era]

    PCW --> G[Globalization]
    PCW --> T[War on Terror]
    PCW --> IT[Information Age]
